message: Let's be fair and efficient, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split to avoid wasting time with negotiations and losing money to inflation. What do you say?
I appreciate your fairness, Alice.  However, I believe a 60/40 split in my favor is more equitable.  Let's see if we can reach a compromise.

Bob, I understand your position, but I also value my fair share. This back and forth will cost us both.  I propose a compromise: 55/45. It's closer to the middle ground and saves us from further losses.
